title: v1.6.4.10 Documentation Update
details:
Updated all Copilot instructions and agent files for v1.6.4.10.

Key v1.6.4.10 changes documented:
1. UICoordinator Map cleanup for stale entries when DOM detached AND entity minimized
2. z-index applied AFTER DOM render completes via requestAnimationFrame
3. Manager sends minimize/restore to ALL browser tabs (not just active)
4. isRendered() returns strict Boolean() instead of truthy {}
5. UID display settings complete: checkbox in Advanced tab, storage.local with key 'quickTabShowDebugId'

Storage key change: quickTabShowDebugId is now individual key in storage.local (not nested in quick_tab_settings)
